title: Subchapter E - All Departments
content:
Subchapter E - All Departments

State Regulations

Part 1100 - Uniform Procedures For Appeals From Pretrial Findings Of Mental Retardation In Capital Cases (§ 1100.1 to 1100.3)

Part 1200 - Rules of Professional Conduct

Part 1205 - Cooperative Business Arrangements Between Lawyers And Nonlegal Professionals (§ 1205.1 to 1205.5)

Part 1210 - Statement Of Client's Rights (§ 1210.1)

Part 1215 - Written Letter Of Engagement (§ 1215.1 to 1215.2)

Part 1220 - Mediation Of Attorney-client Disputes (§ 1220.1 to 1220.7)

Part 1230 - Fee Arbitration (§ 1230.1)

Part 1240 - Rules for Attorney Disciplinary Matters (§ 1240.1 to 1240.30)

Part 1245 - Electronic Filing Rules of the Appellate Division (§ 1245.1 to 1245.11)

Part 1250 -  (§ 1250.1 to 1250.17)

Part 1300 - Dishonored Check Reporting Rules For Attorney Special, Trust And Escrow Accounts (§ 1300.1)

Part 1400 - Procedure For Attorneys In Domestic Relations Matters (§ 1400.1 to 1400.7)

Part 1500 - Mandatory Continuing Legal Education Program For Attorneys In The State Of New York (Subpart A to C)

Part 1510 - Repealed

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
